definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]

sentences.english: Dilute the orange juice with water before you drink it.
He makes fresh orange juice with an electric extractor.
sentences.chinese: 他用電動榨汁機榨取新鮮的橙汁。

sentences.english: Which do you prefer, orange juice or green tea?
sentences.chinese: 你較喜歡哪一個，柳橙汁或綠茶？

sentences.english: Automatic juicing machine that you can operate to get fresh squeezed orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 自動榨汁機，你可以把新鮮的操作鮮橙汁。

sentences.english: She recently falls in love for Orange juice and Mango Juice….
sentences.chinese: 最近她愛上了兩種果汁，橙汁和芒果汁。

sentences.english: This new drink tastes much the same as orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 這種新飲料喝起來跟柳橙汁頗爲相似。

sentences.english: Drink three cups of unsweetened orange juice every morning.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨喝三杯無糖的橙汁。

sentences.english: The next day, Erin offered her orange juice at work.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，在她上班時埃林給她一瓶橙汁。

sentences.english: This orange drink contains no artificial flavourings.
sentences.chinese: 這種橙汁飲品不含人工調味料。

sentences.english: Jimmy brings May a glass of orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 吉米給阿美拿來了一杯橙汁。

sentences.english: For the best effect, make it calcium-fortified juice.
sentences.chinese: 爲了達到最佳效果，做成加鈣的橙汁飲用。

sentences.english: We've got some sandwiches and some orange juice.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一些三明治和一些橙汁。

sentences.english: Amanda: Well, how about some coffee now and some orange juice when we eat?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，現在喝點咖啡，等我們喫早餐時喝點柳橙汁如何？

definition: orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
orange juice/CL:瓶[ping2],杯[bei1],罐[guan4],盒[he2]/see also 橙汁[cheng2 zhi1]
